The Fridae Story:



Fridae traces its origin to the eponymous Man Friday, It has been quite a journey for us. What started out as just another day culminated in the conception of Freidae.

Freidae will do the ‘odd jobs’ and make life a little more comfortable for the inhabitants of this deserted island, so to speak
